56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:While the Prophet (ﷺ) was in a Ghazwa he said, "Some people have remained behind us in Medina and we never crossed a mountain path or a valley, but they were with us (i.e. sharing the reward with us), as they have been held back by a (legal) excuse

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حَبَسَهُ الْعُذْرُ عَنِ الْغَزْوِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever is held back from Jihad by a legal cause
